projects.name: TechSaga 2025
projects.description: Led backend development and deployment for TechSaga 2025, the official tech symposium of a reputed institute. Built a secure backend with Django, SQLite, Redis, and JWT. Implemented event registration tracking and email verification. Deployed on AWS with full-stack integration and optimization.

projects.name: APITestify
projects.description: Co-developed APITestify, a Postman-like web tool for testing and debugging APIs. Used Golang for the backend, React.js for the frontend, and MySQL for data storage. Containerized using Docker for efficient deployment.

projects.name: MailSwift
projects.description: Built a robust API for automated email notifications and form responses. Live deployed at mailswift.in, enhancing developer productivity.

projects.name: MediaNest
projects.description: Created a social media platform using PHP and MySQL. Included user login, media posts, likes, and comments. Employed server-side rendering for better performance.

projects.name: BotHive
projects.description: An IoT-focused chatbot using Gemini API. Backend in Golang, frontend in React, deployed via Docker.

projects.name: CropChain
projects.description: RESTful API for farmer crop management using Laravel. Enabled secure user login and data handling.

leadership_justification: Led backend development and deployment for TechSaga 2025, the official tech symposium of a reputed institute.
candidate_fit_summary: Adithya V has 2 years of experience in web development with strong skills in Django, REST APIs, and Git. Their leadership in projects and diverse tech stack make them a strong fit for the Junior Software Developer role.
eligibility_reason: Meets the 1-3 years of experience requirement, has experience with Django, REST APIs, and Git, and demonstrates strong problem-solving and leadership skills.
